commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Match non-HTML5 tags
commits.body:
This includes three categories:

* Deprecated tags: Still in use but sufficiently out of favor to be highlighted as deprecated.
* Removed tags: Have no use in a current browser, but were a valid tag in the past. Marked as illegal.
* Unrecognized tags: Not recognized at all, marked illegal.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Refine tag categories
commits.body:
This breaks tags into five categories:

* meta.tag.metadata
* meta.tag.structure
* meta.tag.inline
* meta.tag.object
* meta.tag.template

This gets rid of meta.tag.block as too similar to the structure category. The template category is intended for HTML templating languages like Smarty or Django templates, not languages like PHP. The object category will be added in a successive commit.
